creator: predrag.kusljevic@gmail.com
text:
If pipe exist in url rqauest Tomcat do not handle reqaest and request do not exist in access log file. Older Tomcat version handle corectly equal url.

Best regards,
Predrag

Unencoded '|' characters are not permitted in URLs. Any client that produces them is broken and needs to be fixed.

Tomcat tightened up validation of request targets in response to CVE-2016-6816 so the chances of this change being reverted are extremely low.
creator: markt@apache.org
